channel.title: 正则表达式s on 学习笔记
channel.description: Recent content in 正则表达式s on 学习笔记

item.title: 正则demo
item.description: .success { color: green; } 正则表达式为 (function() { var regEl = document.getElementsByClassName("regDemo-reg")[0] textarea = document.getElementsByClassName("regDemo-textarea")[0], result = document.getElementsByClassName("result")[0] obj = qs.parse(location.search.slice(1)), str = obj.str, regStr = obj.reg, // regExp每次用完都要重新new reg = strToReg(regStr); regEl.textContent = "正则表达式为:"+regStr+"\n"+'匹配字符串为:"'+str+'"'; textarea.addEventListener("blur",function() { var value = this.value; result.innerHTML = value === ""?"":value.replace(strToReg(regStr),function(matches) { return ""+matches+""; }) }) })();

item.title: Pratice1
item.description: demo "width-8 width-10 -width-5 width-15.6 width-20-" // 在不修改字符串的情况下匹配"width-8"、"width-10"、"width-15.6" answer: /((?<=^)|(?<=\s))width-\d+(?:\.\d+)?((?=$)|(?=\s))/ig
